ModMetaData.name: Nationalist Militarism
ModMetaData.author: SaberVS7
ModMetaData.description:
Adds Shooting Specialist role to Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures' Nationalist meme. No longer will you have to choose between having both Commissars AND effective Guardsmen. The Emperor Protects.
Because it really didn't make sense for Nationalist to be incompatible with Supremacist, by way of being in the same category.

li.displayName: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures
